suction.translation[0].definitions[0].de: the process of removing air or liquid from an enclosed space so that another substance is sucked in, or so that two surfaces stick together
suction.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: My vacuum cleaner has very good suction.
suction.translation[0].definitions[1].de: the force that causes a substance to be sucked into a closed space when the air or liquid already present is removed
